abstract.t: draft-whittle-ivip-db-fast-push-03 was relevant to Ivip before theintroduction (2010-02-26) of Distributed Real Time Mapping (DRTM).While these techniques might be of interest for other purposes, theyare no longer part of Ivip. This -04 version is simply a notice tothis effect. Please see draft-whittle-ivip-drtm.
